entry.title: Hexo GitHub blog搭建
entry.content: #ssh生产绑定1ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "kevin24067@gmail.com" 1eval $(ssh-agent -s) 1ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa 1clip < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub #安装插件1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 1git config --global core.autocrlf false 1npm install hexo-generator-feed --save 1npm install -- save-dev hexo-util 1npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save #创建博客123456hexo inithexo new post ""hexo ghexo shexo dhexo clean
